lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Okay, wait. Okay. When I say, "Tary," you say "Who?" Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Who!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Who!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When I say, "Tary," you say, "Who?" Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: When I say, "Tary," you say "What!" Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: What!

lines.name: BRAIN
lines.text: Tary!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: What!

lines.name: BRAIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Travis Willingham! Laura Bailey! Liam O'Brien! Marisha Ray! Taliesin Jaffe! Children, shield your eyes. I present to you: Sam Riegel! And the man that brought us all together. Ladies and gentlemen, Matthew Mercer! The cast of Critical Role, ladies and gentlemen! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! Fucking shit! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And in that regard, so we don't keep you too long before we can get to the game which you all came here to watch, let's go through some quick announcements. Very quick. In fact, I think the big announcement, if Liam and Taliesin want to take that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, they're excited about reading. They love books!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've only told them about the pictures so far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys know what a crucial part of this community the artists have become, and we have selected 89 artists from many more; there wasn't enough-- pages are limited, do I have a page number on here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 260 something pages?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: 256, Liam!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 256 pages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've seen it, and it is beautiful. There's going to be a deluxe edition and a standard edition. It will be available for sale in the Geek & Sundry store in the late fall, published by Hunters Books.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll say, regardless of what version, when you actually get the book, it's going to be treated as an artifact from the Cobalt Reserve, so there's going to be historical texts and writings from various librarians in the Cobalt Reserve, chronicling the adventures of Vox Machina, including a lot of fun Easter eggs. And there will be some fun Easter eggs in there, there may even be some background meta data that doesn't really exist anywhere else.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We stood around and looked at a proof of this about a week ago, and I might have gotten a little verklempt. It is really special. So keep your eyes open for it. Oh yeah, one last thing. To keep up to date, I'm sure we'll talk more about it, but you can visit geekandsundry.com/artbook to sign up for email updates and book previews, so do so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It should be available for ordering sometime in the late fall.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Late fall!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys very much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, thank you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're hoping to have those in tomorrow, for those who can come to the signing, and even if you didn't get a ticket for the signing, come to the event anyway. We will have those available to pass out, hopefully. So you can pick from the two, or grab one of each, it's going to be ridiculous. One of the particular images, I'm excited to see where Scanlan shows up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's absurd.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why's this small man on the Sistine Chapel? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, let's bring this down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Vox Machina, what do you want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a great question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see those trammels. Who has the trammels?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to look at them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All of them or just one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking hell, shit. Here you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it. I just want to hold them, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're real big, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm cradling them, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Surprisingly, though, due to the platinum's design, they're not as heavy as you expect them, whether it'd be the enchantment or the material that it was made from. They're still heavy for you, Vex, because your strength is pretty shitty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell which one is which god?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. The one that glows yellow, you feel a slight bit of kinship with the blessing you received from Pelor, the Dawnfather. The other two, you can differentiate being the sky blue color, probably with Ioun, the Knowing Mistress, and the black probably representing the Raven Queen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, cool, I'm going to hold on to the Pelor one. Pass them back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got the other two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know if anybody else wants to hold one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just in case things go sour I also thought of a nice way to use these, and I slide one between each of my fingers, and I hold it up. (shink) Okay, back in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you still embiggened right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I haven't been biggened for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he was only big fighting the bulette.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, wait. By the way, I believe you said that if I successfully did all of these trammels that you had something for me. Thought I wouldn't remember, did you? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did say that. It's rather personal, though, I hope the rest of you can understand that. I'm not going to be around for much longer, so I wanted to say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want us to step out so you can have a moment?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we'll find a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What does that mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's awkward; it's not something I'm comfortable talking with--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you want us to leave?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! We can talk out a plan. Tonight before we go to bed. It could be now; it could be later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've said too much about it now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Grog by the arm, and I usher him out the door of the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside the mansion? You're out the mansion now? LIAM:Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going outside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just out the front door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into the inside of the volcano?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it on fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's certainly very hot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck it, Grog, let's go downstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: War room!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has 40 floors!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going down to the war room, which is a sand pit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These fucking assholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have fun, you two!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use protection! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what Grog is for!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you descend the staircase into the subterranean war room, where there you see before you the giant sand pit that is currently adorned with multiple training dummies with armor and weapons. Strapped to them, magnificently pristine, based on how many times you destroyed and/or restructured the chamber, but there it lies before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah? That's me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to be around much longer, probably, or you're not going to be around much longer; one or the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Boy, I've been holding on to a thing for a while now. Taryon, that scamp, gave me a gift ages ago. He became a fan after I pranked his ass at the beach. He caught the bug, and before we said our goodbyes, he talked to me for a bit and gave me something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pranked his ass, and he caught the bug? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could say "turducken" and you people would turn it into sexual innuendo! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasping and cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot about that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I was right to assume then, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Taco.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know a lot of big words, but I feel like I need a little bit of clarification.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because let's be honest, that guy would fuck a turducken in front of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just for the record, I had no doubts about where that conversation was going. None. You have a deal. I don't know how or when we are going to pull this off, but if you don't make time--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It could be tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's what I don't have. I don't have a plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, me neither. We never have those. So listen, maybe while we're eating some of those shitty salads that this fucking place makes now, you can drizzle it on the top, or does he have to drink it with a drink?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think he just needs to down it one way or another. It could be mixed with something else; it could be on its own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who do we make him fall in love with?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I know that's a shitty idea, but we have to get up and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter and cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that means isolating the gnome away from the others, because he could fall in love with literally anything or anyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not sure I know what that means, but I will carry this baton and follow your lead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plan A, Plan B. You know those letters, you know that far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do. I know that part. And we head back to the group.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a pretty crazy few days but I feel like you've all accepted me and I'm so happy to be back. And I can't thank you enough, really, from the bottom of my heart. Thank you. Thank you for fully accepting me back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know we love you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love you, too. Not in a weird way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. I'm married.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just friends.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be awkward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, what are you guys talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, just how much we love life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How we're a happy family, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are. We are close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells) Who wants a drink? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a great idea, Grog. Invisible servants, bring us the finest vegan wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just wine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But no added animal fats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not wrong. Goblets are placed across the tables. Drinks are poured and you all have within your grasp a fair nightcap, if you will, before you find rest for the evening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (clears throat) Scanlan. Man. Great teamwork today. Everyone, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, seriously. I'm so amazed with both you and Percy. You really pulled through, and we would be lost without both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Synergizing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that fight could've gone terribly, and we pulled through as a team.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, a hundred percent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, though? I know in the past, Vax, I've had my differences with you. I didn't like you charging after that dragon that one time, and we had some issues, but tonight I feel like we're close and you would never do anything to betray me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that wine looks really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here, let me hold your drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You been down but what's it going to take to give you some sack, man? How about 2,400 Critters chanting, "Vax'ildan! Vax'ildan! Vax'ildan!" (chanting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29. That was inspiration to me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's inspiring you because he thinks you're going to fucking fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, why don't you go ahead and make a perception check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I instantly dive and grab Keyleth's eyes and cover them, and turn her away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop. Get off of me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why? Your hands are a little clammy. Oh god! Why are you sweating? Why are you nervous? You're nervous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, your drink is available for you at the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was a great song, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good stuff! Man, I just feel invigorated!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you finish the drink, you blink your eyes. I'm going to ask you, Scanlan, who do you see first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here, what do we got, six people over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have two that have dove off to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Then I'll roll a d4. One, two-- oh wait, it's just three. It was a fucking four. Two! Okay, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Keyleth is being shielded right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Well, then it's just Vex or Percy? Or wait, are those two, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other people in the room right now are Percival, Vex, or Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well, then it would be Grog. Do I have three choices or four?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have four choices!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So here's my question, Scanlan. First and foremost, let me pull up. Is there a saving throw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Philter of Love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can recite it for you, if you like. The next time you see a creature within ten minutes after drinking this philter, you become charmed by the creature for one hour. If the creature is of a species and gender you are normally attracted to-- turducken-- you regard it as your true love while you are charmed. This potion's rose-hued effervescent liquid contains one easy-to-miss bubble shaped like a heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And I guess my question to you, Scanlan, is based on your journeys and travels across the lands of Tal'Dorei and beyond, how adventurous have you been in your various exploits?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've gone much further than that since then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then as you glance up into the beautiful eyes of the white-haired Master of Whitestone, his white locks gently curling at the tips from an afternoon of sweating amongst the heat of the volcano, his fingers gingerly caressing the outside of the goblet in which he's enjoyed his own wine. You find yourself impossibly attracted to your once ally, now direction of your affection.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know if it's the wine talking, but oh man. I feel something I've never felt before, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sounds like the wine talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your eyebrows. I want to lick them. They seem soft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That came out wrong. What I meant was, what are you doing later?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up and I palm Scanlan's forehead and slam him to the ground. What the fuck are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The way all sound fades away when he's talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's his Silence spell that he got recently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The way he

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would this be an insight check, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's not! Is it really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to feel his forehead. Does he feel warm?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you felt this way? This is a bit--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It feels like forever. (singing) One song, glory. One song to win your heart, glory. Where do I even start?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what's happening right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) One song from the pretty boy gnome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We fucked up. Oh man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, I don't blame you. I don't. This seems to be coming out of nowhere, and he's married to me, and I will cut you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love knoweth no boundaries, and even though there's a significant age difference between us--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much of an age difference?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why does marriage need to be so constricting, man? I mean, can't we be free in this crazy mixed-up world?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to pretend that I'm not extremely flattered by this, and I am, but I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want to see you naked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, are you experiencing a bit of cotton mouth? Maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (smacking) Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are your pupils a little dilated?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The lights.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look into his eyes. Are his eyes dilated?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Vax. What did you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it that hard to believe that maybe someone finds me attractive? (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, this is all besides the point. We have a god to kill. What are we going to do about the god?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter and cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And shortly, it will be my time to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After this unique and unexpected display of overt affection, you find yourself sitting around a table amongst the mansion to discuss over your wine and confusion what plan of action to take next in your journey to take down the Whispered One, the Undying King.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit directly between Percy and Scanlan for all of this conversation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we rest and then we go hunting? Or do we try and rally allies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Mage Hand to tickle Percy's knee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a 23 passive perception, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see him starting to make his fingers over towards your boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab his fingers and start to bend them backwards. I whisper in his ear: do you want to keep playing your fucking lute or not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, what the fuck is wrong with you? How long have you felt this way? Because this is very fucking strange, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Victor's ball sack. Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Learn from my mistakes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are they so singed? All right. Okay, let's focus up. Okay. Go on, strategize.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time! We don't have a lot of time. So what are we going to do with it? Are we going to get allies? Are we going to talk to Allura again? Gilmore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, wait. First things first, do we know where he is? Don't you have the ability to like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah. Is he still in the same place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know in here; I need to shove my head out the door for a sec.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, shove your head out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you emerge into the heated air of the sub-ocean volcano, you take a moment and concentrate and you can sense the direction and distance seems to be approximately the same.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hasn't moved at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You take about five minutes or so to concentrate, and while the distance and direction is relatively the same, there is very faint movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to feel gradual coming towards where we are, away, anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are currently, which is in the volcano, it seems to be east and south of its previous location.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where would that move him towards?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should maybe go to Vasselheim in the morning, start to rally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Do Allura and Gilmore and Kima and everyone, do they know what's going on? Have we sent word?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we've sent some word out to the world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've sent messages to Tary and to who else? There were two messages sent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary, the Ashari.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaylie. I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We activated the beacons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I always mess them up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we should rest and head to Vasselheim?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not any good to anybody at the moment, so I imagine so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we'll all feel better after a night's sleep. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, where are you sleeping tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In my room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need to post guards outside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have all the guards I need. Don't worry, I'll be safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not worried about you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll be fine!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) It'll be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to sleep and then to Vasselheim?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We rest and then we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the morning, journey to the cradle of civilization, Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do set a bucket trap at the door just in case. I set a bucket trap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As everybody's trundling up the stairs, I catch Grog alone for a second and say: let this stand as a testament to how much I love you. I'm sorry that I shaved your beard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (applause)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give him a little pinch on the cheek. Oh, Grog, you couldn't if you tried. Now. Good night, big guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all find yourselves in your chambers. Anything else you wish to do before the evening comes to a close?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Sorry, Matt. I know we're trying to get to other things, but magic compels me to put on my best silk g-string, and it compels me to use the series of tunnels that interconnect all of the rooms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That only I know about. And it compels me to sneak into Percival's room in the dead of night and crawl into bed with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm in the bed, you motherfucker!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you in there?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're married!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it was like the 50s, where you had two twin beds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you seen their gold pile?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I guess I better be extra stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a slight jostle, Vex'ahlia and Percival, you both pop one eye open and glance over as what you thought at first might be a small child crawling into your bed, scared of a midnight storm, instead find a magnificent, silk-adorned, familiar gnome trying to wedge himself between your bodies, which is impressive, based on the spooning position you're already in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let it happen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And that's a strength ability check?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a strength check, I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a check or saving throw? That's the distinction now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is it? It's a check, not a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a rapid series of clicks, whirrs and grinding of metal, you watch as a metallic exoskeleton unwinds from the sphere, (clicking) wraps itself around your body. You find yourself suddenly bound and held in place, unable to shift, as these cold metal bars wrap around you like an exoskeleton.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan Shorthalt, tell me now why I shouldn't feed you to Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I undo the lock so he can talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry! I don't know what's happening to me. I know that this is your marital bed. Can I at least watch? I promise I won't look at you, Vex. I won't look at you at all! I'll just be looking at Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would we know that something is wrong?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a one. I don't know anything's wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I making? Insight. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now that you're up close and definitely discerning his behavior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking A.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a 12, but I rolled a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that something's off and different, but you think it may be a practical joke or he's just trying to fuck with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All I have is Lesser Restoration. Unless you're fucking with me, I'm going to try Lesser Restoration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we could go to his room and defile his room. God only knows what's happened there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing, darling. If something is wrong with him, and this is so out of character I'm afraid something is wrong with him-- not that you're not completely desirable--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I needed to hear; go on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he needs a good night's sleep and I'm afraid he won't get it in this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not sure if it'll work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In case it's not, don't do that anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You extend your hand. You complete the incantation under your breath and begrudgingly administer a Lesser Restoration spell onto his body. You watch as his gnomish form suddenly flashes with a brief burst of divine energy, and as it subsides, his eyes blink and stare back to Percival with the same longing lust that he had when he entered the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, fuck. I got nothing. Scanlan! Seriously, this is not acceptable. Go to bed! If we let you out of this cage, will you go to bed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled agreement)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send Trinket to your room with you, and he's going to sleep on top of you so that you will go to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled agreement)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manners. (click)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, as you fall the ground, clasping the floor with your hands and knees, breathing heavily, still the warmth subsiding from the slight touch that you received at Percival's fingertips. Based on the time you spent drinking, conversing, scattering to your rooms, getting dressed and making sure you were properly prepared for this endeavor, making your way through the tunnels stealthing in at this moment, it's right about now that the phial wears off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ha ha! Just a birthday prank. Is it your birthday?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Too much information. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have a good evening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good evening. Do you walk out the main door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The main door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's basically a flour base. It's going to be a real pain to wash off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a ghost-white, bucket-headed gnome in a silk g-string.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? Why did you do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I'll see you in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shift some furniture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, when everyone asks me tomorrow on social media why I did it, same answer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was good. Well done, you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After some disconcerting conversation between the married couple and a shameful walk back to your own chambers, you eventually find yourself coming to rest for the evening. After a full night's sleep, you find yourself with your spells restored, your hit points restored, half your hit dice restored, and an embarrassing morning breakfast before you. As you all come down to a fine vegan breakfast meal there on the table, you all have conversation, start plotting and planning, and you hear the gentle footsteps of one slowly approaching Scanlan to the breakfast table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, hey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (husky) Hey. (clears throat) Didn't sleep a lot. Sorry. Hey, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What distributor do you get your wine from? Just curious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to talk about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, Vasselheim?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How are you doing that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do we have a plan before we get there? Before I teleport us into the middle of a city that might possibly be in the middle of a war zone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't I go see how much progress he's made? And I stick my skull out the door again and see how far he's gotten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very good. 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Listening to your senses and focusing on the direction, still traveling. Still relatively slow pace, as far as the general distance, but it's making headway. It's traveled throughout the night a number of miles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should at least prepare Vasselheim, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. He hasn't obviously gotten there, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If a wrath of a dark god is on its way, they should probably prepare themselves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, I'm assuming he's traveling with an army.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would assume. With one eye each.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. What if Vasselheim is a show of power?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be likely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's hurry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where to in Vasselheim?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long would it take us to get out? Oh, wait. We chartered that boat; do we care about those people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or are we just going to leave them in the middle of the ocean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were only going to wait for us a couple of days, and then they were going to head back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they would assume we drowned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, fair argument.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you gather that probably when they drove a bunch of yahoos out in the middle of the ocean to dive under a volcano in the ocean that they did not expect you to return.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did put a 500 gold holding deposit on, an incidental that we will not get back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quick, cast Lesser Restoration on yourself!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It would probably take us a while to get up and out to a tree, right? I'm being a little selfish with my upper-level spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I feel it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up and out to it. Up the volcano, up the water--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you know what? Don't worry about it, let's go. Let's just Plane Shift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an arduous journey back to any possible tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wanted to talk that one out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I Plane Shift us to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys encircle your hands once more, Keyleth, you focus on whereabouts in Vasselheim?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Trial Forge?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or Melora's tree maybe? (laughter and applause)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Residual magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Trial Forge?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where will you not get arrested?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one's going to even notice me. Yeah, they were ringing the bells and running around and getting prepared and stuff. Yeah, and if for some reason, somebody's like, "That guy punched me in "the face," we'll just punch them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree with this plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trial Forge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You notice an argument between two Bastions and a middle-aged bearded man who is painting a familiar symbol on his front door, not too far from where you stand. A five-year-old girl cries and clings to his leg. What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the symbol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll make a perception check. Let's see if you'll roll a one again. No, that's much better. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing at this distance, you see a familiar and striking shape. It is a haphazardly drawn circle with dark, reddish purple paint and a small line and a pronged fork of four prongs painted up against this wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hell no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's painting it on the door? The guy in the city is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The father figure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It could be to pass over their house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pass over?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the Vecna symbol, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sensing the distance of Vecna, he's still far to the northwest of here. But what was once a few hundred miles is now shortened, about two hundred or so, and getting lesser and lesser.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Should we go up and talk to that guy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe one of us. Maybe not all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make the shout, you see the soldiers are currently arguing with him. One says, "You "welcome this rubbish? Are you one of them kook believers?" And the father is angrily staring in his face and says, "You mind your business. I have no love for "this, but if these dreams are true, I must protect my family."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They turn and look at you as you approach.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The soldiers take a step back with a look of recognition across you as you step forward with your white dragon scale armor. They know not to approach and there is seemingly a sense of knowing who you are, at least from the legends that are told amongst the streets of Vasselheim. The father turns to you and seeing your lordly approach, and strong voice, immediately. "The nightmares I've "had, and I'm not the first. This symbol. It scares me, but if something comes like they say it is, I "must it let it know we have no quarrel. To leave my family be."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This symbol will not protect you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How do you know this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I know his followers. They won't have mercy. They'll gouge out eyes, remove your hand, and make you one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Hold on. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he looks at you for a moment, his eyes keen with fear, and his face. "You're certain of "this, my lady?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will you protect us, then?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll do our best. That's what we're here for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (applause)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dear god, I hope that works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be safe." And they both wander off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think they noticed you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, I'm fucking slick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing the location, you're not that far from the Quadroads juncture between the different areas. You can go further towards the Trial Forge or back towards the center of where the Quadroads meets between that and where the Platinum Sanctuary and Platinum Dragon section is. There is the temple to Sarenrae, where you left Pike previously. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the crazy zealot still running around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He seems to be scattered through the streets. He's maybe 60 feet away, still shouting obscenities and weird doom-saying prophecies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I walk up to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As he's shouting this time, "He will come! He will destroy us! You! He will destroy "you, too! I've seen it! I've seen it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I believe you. I've seen it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good! Then save yourself! Run! Run far!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. How did he talk to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In my mind. In my dreams. He comes. He says it's inevitable. The clouds, they come as the "first warning. The first seal broken. The sky has already left us. The sun is gone!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, no. Accurate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beware the Undying King!" And he goes to run off, away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he already gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's running away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I don't know how to deal with that type of abrasive personality.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's best to not let people give him power, because the more people believe in him, the stronger of a god he becomes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that guy resisted. He knew when others didn't. And he was crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could you maybe make the sun reappear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Can I do a nature check to see if this is above my capabilities?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's definitely an unnatural form of weather pattern. You get the sense that this is itself a minor miracle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A minor miracle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah. The sky that stretches beyond all sides of the horizon is of similar strange, roiling cloud doom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it like Ghostbusters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very similar, yeah. We're talking top of the tower, curling ink clouds out to each side, traveling with vast speed in almost all directions. You see no plain, single path in which they're traveling. They're emanating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This seems like a minor miracle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Can you miracle more?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could maybe try to carve out a patch of sunlight above us, but I don't think it would be anything more than a morale boost, at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we did it at a temple, perhaps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe above the Sarenrae temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's bearing down on us. We need to tell Pike. We need to warn the authorities. We need to tell the Temple of Bahamut, the Slayer's Take.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have to keep people from defecting to him. The more people that he has, the more of his symbols that get spread around out of fear, the more he'll win.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, but we can only either spread the word that we're going to resist or spread the word that it's about time to fight. We can only do one or the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's coming, one way or another.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to one of the guards of Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them's rushing past. He has a cluster of spears under one arm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sir!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If there was a universal sign of Vasselheim, a symbol of Vasselheim, or a sign to fight, what would it be? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is no universal symbol. There are many symbols in Vasselheim. All the various "divinities that lie here have their own symbol."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I didn't know if there was like a rally or cry or something that you all universally believed in. There's got to be something, a symbol of Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vasselheim is a divided and united city as one."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, you know what? Never mind! Jeez, your politics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a strange glint of a glare towards your larger goliath friend. Right as he begins to squint, you hear a voice in the distance go, "Lieutenant, we need you!" "Right away." And he rushes off with spears under his arm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Lieutenant, for nothing. Okay, maybe some sort of sign will help them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're going to make a sun appear--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it at the temple of Sarenrae or the temple of Pelor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, we go to the temple of Sarenrae!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the temple. You enter the interior, and you can see most everyone is in silent prayer. They're all either holding hands or clutching close their smaller kin, these renewed worshippers of the Everlight. Glancing around, you don't see Pike currently in the vicinity. All you see is one of the head priests, Coraline, who's currently off to the side is tending to a few of the folks from the interior.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, there's a discussion, a meeting of "some kind."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right now. She left not but an hour ago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Philosophers gather near Holy Curator Curtis Uleas of the Quadroads of Erathis. The Gladekeepers of the Birthheart stand behind the High Hierophant Ophera, while the dark-veiled maidens of the Raven Queen gather, leaderless, as is their order. Pike stands at the edge of the council, trying to listen in, before seeing you and rushing to your side. (panting) "Hi!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did it work? Did you do it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! (whispering) We got the stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) We made them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Things are a bit tense." And as she turns, you see now at the back of the council, towering over most others and without armed support stands the dark-skinned, beautiful J'mon Sa Ord, their simple clothing swathed in a loose hanging robe of gold and sky blue. J'mon's smoldering pupils shift in your direction, and they give you a nod of respect. The discussions halt as you approach, recognition also falling across the room. At which point, the Highbearer Vord turns to you saying, "Vox Machina, with a gift of timing. Have you anything to aid in this crisis?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then please, take the center of the chambers. I believe everyone here could use some "form of good news." He steps back, and as the rest of the guards empty, they open the central space of the chamber for you to approach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, technically we've already been observable, so there's very little that we can say that he doesn't already know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's listening right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much do you know already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You went off to a volcano?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scaldseat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we defeated it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You defeated a volcano?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, I'm sure you've realized by this point that Vecna has ascended to godhood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he begins to speak, immediately the High Hierophant Ophera steps forward. "Yes, the dreams "have spread. We've seen and spoken with the clerics all across this land, and it seems that a "new force has shoved its way amongst the rest of the pantheon, though apparently closer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not reached his full power yet. The only way it will happen is if he claims a great use of power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, performs a miracle. He needs followers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's on his way here. The more followers he has, the more power he has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that, when you say, "he's on his way here," you watch as Groon steps forward, arms still crossed. "How do you know he's coming?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammers) Just look outside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, hey, whoa. Take it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't need the sass.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I'm not sassing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With respect, there are those among us that can tell where he is moving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am the paladin of the Raven Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His words are that of our lady." And both of them step back once more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you met them before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They said it in unison.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you friends? Are you on the same mailing list?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all look similar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So yeah, he's got this ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has granted me knowledge of his whereabouts, and he is coming fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are welcome, Arcanist Vysoren."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura, does the sky look like this in Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It, in the past 12 hours or so, has stretched across the Ozmit Sea and now seeks to "consume as far as the east coast of Tal'Dorei. If this is what I believe it is, within the next "half-to-full day the entirety of Exandria will be under the shaded sky of Vecna."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not all miracles have to be deadly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Will you be there fighting with our armies, in the front line?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will. I guess my only question is: do we wait for him to come to us, or do we try to take the fight to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not wish to fight him where he expects it. As we are a city that has prided itself on its "impenetrable defenses, I can guarantee you that this entity has seemingly procured, or cleverly "divined, some way of breaching. I gather he would expect less us bringing it to him. We hoped to "have information on the whereabouts of this city directly. What else do we have?"

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you watch as Vord steps forward, fiddling with one finger. "Long ago, this "grand temple nearly fell to the prying minds of terrible mages. This here," and he pulls a ring from his finger, "is called the Band of Shrouds, a powerful implement of the Highbearer to shunt "these prying magics aside. I lend it to you for the coming struggle." And he passes it over to Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: "Kept close enough to the one who wears this ring, I doubt even his newly born eyes could "pierce it. However, it can only affect those nearby, so if you are to strike, perhaps it's best "you do so away from his vision, and we distract."

lines.name: MATT

"Well, all forces on high for impending attack here, wyvern "riders and air units, we need eyes on the Tordusk Pass, in case the city is indeed moving as they "say. The High Hierophant will aid in transporting advanced scouts to the base of the Zenwicks. We "would wish you be part of this if you are willing and able. Gathering information and seeking "weakness to exploit are the key. Vox Machina, you are our focused stealth strike force into Thar "Amphala."

lines.text: Ophera steps forward. "It's a distraction, a bluff. We're close, and he knows it." Vord then turns to her and says, "I will not abandon my family. Vecna knows too much, we have "no more time. Those who are primed for assault, it begins now. Vox Machina, how do you wish to "proceed?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even getting my sheets printed out for this game has been a whole ordeal. Thank you, Dani! As this is happening and you guys are amongst yourselves figuring out what to do, and the rest of the crowd is murmuring, you hear the footfalls, another, another, another, the approach of J'mon Sa Ord. "My warriors defend this city, but my strength also lies in the front lines. If a "distraction is what you need to succeed, there are few things as distracting as a shining dragon. I "will fly with the wyverns once Vox Machina has been delivered, and the delivery shall be upon the "wings I bear, if you'll have me." (cheering)

There is a tension being passed around, but right now they're letting you strategize before you bring what you have to the table. Right now, they have nothing until you have a strategy.

For the sake of brevity, as everyone is cautiously waiting for the ring's attunement, eventually you feel the energy click as the ring has been slipped on for this time. You feel this slight shimmer of cold wash through your body and extend outward. At which point, you know the ring has finally been attuned.

And if your enemy is as strong a magic user as I know, he will use distance to his "advantage. Close that distance and make it your advantage. I know not quite what he's capable of "in his new ascended form, and that scares me. But strike quickly, strike true. Everything you've "got, work together. Communicate. And anything you can do to allow yourself preparation, and the jump "on this fray, do it. That ring that Vord gave you, that'll be a boon enough. If you can catch him off "guard, that might mean everything."

They're taking off in clusters and circling. "They're all "counting on you. They're going to make sure that you have the opportunity you have, to put those to "good use." And she glances off to the side of your pouch, closed as it is. "Come back." She turns around to go and join Kima.

As you guys approach and watch, you see as other generals and such begin to gather their army units. They begin to discuss orders, and a number of them in the middle of this refer over to you guys. The light in this area is very close to near dusk almost, with how much the sunlight is blotted out by the cloud cover that has completely consumed the skyline, from horizon to horizon, on all sides.
