lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my fucking god. Just a note. These were made from the heart of a felled titan. I don't think it's that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be! That one's dead!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was sarcasm, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to take him, one on one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean you can beat him up from the inside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, beat him up with his heart!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stammering) Do I notice anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not in particular. You clap, and it sounds booming, as it would. The closer you get, you sense this very faint vibration to them, as if proximity keys you in, and even your simple mind, Grog, can gather that these were crafted and made from whatever it is you see storming through that ravine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I feel Vecna riding on this guy's shoulder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense the direction and distance of Vecna directly where this entity lies. I would like you to make a perception check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check. Just him for now as he's focusing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems so big yet so small. As you get closer, you can see these bee swarm-like clusters resemble creatures you saw in the Shadowfell not too long ago, and there atop the shelf of its gargantuan torso, you see a cityline resting atop of this entity. There lies a portion of Thar Amphala, moving with this gargantuan primordial earth titan, risen from below its long-held tomb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on us. It's not going to make any difference, but I'm going to do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will that work on the back of a big shiny dragon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another note, to be clear, these were carved from the heart stone of a ruined earth primordial. When they're doing their thing, they make me resistant to fire, cold, and lightning damage. So. That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Theory time. Maybe. This primordial is marching with Thar Amphala on its back to Vasselheim. If I were a god, wanting to prove that I'm awesome and do a big miracle thing, I would drop a giant city on top of another city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or destroy the city and replace it with that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can stop this, though. All we have to do is beat the titan. I've got magic missiles that can do 1d6 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d4 plus one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could be in business!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe lead it away from Vasselheim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's also, in theory, necrotic, which means it can be turned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be one powerful fucking spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to do something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, how strong are you feeling right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look back at Pike, who's clutching onto the back of J'mon Sa Ord. Seeing this, her face pale white, eyes wide. She's like, "I don't know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all right, buddy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got it. You're a monster!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (weakly) "I'm a monster! It's also a monster!" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we land on the city on its back, or should we try to fuck up the titan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should dive into one of the beehive tunnels and stealth in. I think

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However," and as the dragon's head turns and looks ahead, you can see some of these clusters of gloomstalkers have broken away from the titan, swarming in your direction. You're about, I'd say, a mile and a half away from it and gaining, only because you're pushing at full speed. You're seeing now them breaking off into the clusters and you hear the distant (screeching).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know we bamfed out here, but do we have any idea how much time we have? How far away from Vasselheim we are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far have we gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fom what you can tell, make a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to guess, too, because he's asking out loud.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do it, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My modifier, my

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too bad! You haven't traversed this area of the north side of Issylra before, but gathering based on where you were, seeing the sinkhole, and the distance that Vax'ildan was giving you earlier, you imagine it's probably about 200 miles or so away from Vasselheim.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, we've got time. Not a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a very wide gait with each step.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's like Godzilla, right? It's like (groaning, thud).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! So you have time, but it's not 200 miles on normal person feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if he starts skipping, we're fucked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Keyleth. Do you have any of that Wild Guide-- is that what's it called? That herb that scares away the undead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do. Well, I grabbed some, so I can cultivate more of it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're a mile and a half away, and they see us, it looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're closing in, there's a short time before they reach you. Remember, at this traveling speed, any sort of smoke-based censer material is going to go right behind you like a flare.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we turn into clouds, Keyleth, and fly off of our dragon ride and poof inside the titan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see what I packed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'd be in the air, and not all of us are so awesome in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could fall off this dragon's back real fast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. We could do Wind Walk. It's going to take a minute to transform in and out. I also have Animal Shapes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: J'mon, can you become invisible, by any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: J'mon, you hear the voice rumble, "I can, but only myself. I could maybe affect a couple of you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could affect a couple of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That leaves quite a few of us left. Maybe, J'mon, could you get--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could muster about four."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's enough. Three and four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't add.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or! I could make J'mon look like one of those dark flappy things and make us look like undead creatures?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They probably have seen us coming, though; they're on their way here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Invisible, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least we're a smaller target, at that point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can throw out a fog cloud and try and fog us the rest of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll fly through it; it won't work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in clouds!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you do the thing, we'll keep going through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Yeah. That's a good point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Invisible or change us. One or the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could do invisible and I could fly as fast as I fucking can away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screeching) The cloud breaks ahead and you watch as two gloomstalkers come diving down towards the back of J'mon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do invisible!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot one with an arrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shoot the other one with a gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys, roll attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. We're going at a speed that it doesn't matter. Did that just happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I just knocked over a wine bottle.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: A grape juice bottle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should have said this. I was going to burn a grit to drop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I figured that was the case. One of them gets shot with an arrow and as the impact hits, it shrieks but continues its dive. The second one gets shot by-- which weapon was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Animus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Animus. You watch as the detonation of the spray of black from the impact of the bullet hitting. As it shrieks, its wings buckle from underneath and it plummets about 30 or 40 feet or so and falls out of its dive. The one, however, is still diving and it's going to go for the one that shot it with its arrow. Natural two. That's going to be a 13. I'm pretty sure that doesn't hit you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its claws hits the back of the dragon scales. You hear the scrape of it going across the back, but having no effect on the hard, armored brass dragon's back. The gloomstalker then shrieks once more and takes back up into the clouds and vanishes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I get an attack of opportunity on it with daggers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can definitely attack it with daggers, if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If my friend the dragon is against it, do I get sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That is 12 for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 damage. How much damage did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it shrieks and vanishes back into the clouds above, you can see now the wyvern riders around are starting to charge in, as well. As you're rushing now, you're maybe three-quarters of a mile from the exterior of this giant earth titan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You complete your incantation in time with J'mon, and the entirety of your party turns transparent and is now free from visual perspective.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we get everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did three?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do four if J'mon can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: J'mon can do four. Well, Pike and J'mon would be eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we'll do four and four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you all manage to disappear and go into a dive. As soon as you all vanish, which is interesting because you disappear, and suddenly your mount disappears, and all your friends disappear. So you're clutching on to what you hope is still dragon scales and fur as you look down and see clouds, ground, mountains, and eventual, plummeting death, were you not holding onto the back of the dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, if our eyelids are invisible, does that mean we can't even close our eyes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can close your eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's too much. Too much. Not cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, because the enchantment doesn't make you translucent, just invisible to the visual gaze, the interior of your eyelids would not be affected by it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. That's my worst nightmare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still see the inside of the cloak somewhat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I was just having a Clockwork Orange moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You make yourself more nauseous by closing your eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go into this dive, you can hear the clashing of wyvern against gloomstalker. You hear the yelps and the shrieks of two different bestial cries. You hear shouts of humanoid and elven voices shouting as spears are tossed, arrows are let loose, and this aerial fray begins. With that, you glance forward as the dragon comes out of a dive, J'mon leading you towards this gargantuan entity. You can hear the further volume, the (massive footsteps). Even slower than that, probably, based on the gait it has to walk and the speed it's going. It is like watching a mountain with legs move. As you approach, what do you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see a clearing? A landing spot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check, guys. All of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight, awesome. All right. Keyleth. You guys, at this distance, it's hard to make out details. But Keyleth, you rolled a 30, which according to 5th Edition is nearly impossible as a DC. So. You glance about and amongst the broken rock exterior of this behemoth entity, you can see towards the base of its right leg, towards the back, a faint trickle of water, like a waterfall of pee, probably. A trickling of a waterfall that's flowing from its back leg area and then dissipating as it plummets into the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it coming from the city or coming from the titan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the titan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's leaking from the back of his calf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go in there, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From the back of his hip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see if we can land on that burst pimple, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think there's any landing. I think there's going to be-- yeah. But you know what? Let's see what happens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fly in close to that waterfall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you point this out to J'mon? All right. You hear the dragon voice boom up once more. "Hold on!" Goes into an intense dive trying to bring-- because previously you were about level, if not a little higher than Thar Amphala on the top of the entity. J'mon goes into a dive towards the hip area that you point out. The wind is pushing past you. You're holding on for dear life because any possible loss of grip not only is going to loose you from the dragon, which is going to be hard to find you, as you're all invisible, depending on the dragon's abilities, I guess. But as you begin to push down into this dive, I want you all to make strength saving throws, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, strength? Jeez Louise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering) (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got an 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using my first Luck of the day. Oh, that's worse. That is a nine for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God. A 22 for me. I know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a group success or failure thing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In almost a poetic justice way, both Vax and Keyleth begin to lose their grip, and with a sequence of moments, they both get blown off the back of the brass dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wouldn't even know. Were they touching each other? Tell me they were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Vax are currently now, no grip on any dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax! Whisper!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I throw my dagger at that sound.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds like us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were you saying you were going to come to me? There's the 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, because she is invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your armor class, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, so you can bamf to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's right. 12 plus psychic damage, honey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys have a fucked-up relationship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our entire relationship has been psychic damage, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as soon as the pain hits you, it's immediately allayed by the impact of Vax's arms wrapping around you for dear life.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sputtering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm kissing you already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both are now tumbling and plummeting through the sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to fly, or should I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on! And I go giant eagle form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I'll say you skirt under what would reveal invisibility. You lose it, however, for attacking her. So now there's a Vax huddled on nothing, full-on Wonder Woman-style invisible jet, riding through the sky. So as you guys coast in, the rest of you hear J'mon go, "It appears we've lost some "passengers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Keep going! (cawing) Tell them! Keep going!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything's fine. How are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: J'mon, they say they're okay. It's okay, we can go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." Continues into the dive. You guys are trailing behind at this point, but making your way down towards the hip region of this entity, following the direction that Keyleth gave at her spotting earlier. As you guys get closer and closer, you can see there is indeed a trickle of a waterfall that is dissipating, the wind is so strong that it gets maybe 25 or 30 feet down before it gets scattered into droplets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it pee-colored?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is actually pretty clear water. You do also glance, as you get closer, it appears to be emerging from some sort of an opening, like a cavern entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's head for the opening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you approach--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have Pass Without a Trace!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, but the flying man does not. So as the rest of you make it up towards the side, and the wind is strong here, you can hear the impact of each footfall, so deafening your eardrums almost shake and are in pain with each impact, the bass of each footfall is immense. But you do see, interestingly enough, there is the waterfall coming out of it. The waterfall is careening down a broken stone staircase. The opening is about 15 feet across and about ten feet wide. It looks like it was at some point attached, before this creature arose, to another series of tunnels or wherever else this dwarven stronghold, this series of vaults that were carved within this creature's body, extended beyond its torso. This is one of the breaking points. As you glance back, you can see your brother coasting down about a hundred or so feet away. You also watch as one of the large arms swings back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I dodge it! I try and dodge it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need both of you guys to make dexterity saving throws. Actually, because you're riding Keyleth right now, it's going to be on the giant eagle form, because you're clutching it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just on you. It's hard to avoid a hundred-plus-foot-wide arm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a save? Wait. This is a dex save, right? I'm blessing Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you see it coming? I'll say you have the time because it's so immense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Add a d4, yeah? Four, yeah! Okay, 24 total!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not enough. You were one away. It's a 25 DC because this is a giant fucking arm! Both you and Vax-- I don't have the dice for this, so I'm going to have to use the app. You both suffer 87 points of bludgeoning damage as the force of a mountain slams into the side of your half-elf and eagle form.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said 87?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 87 points of bludgeoning damage, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I immediately drop form and start falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, any carryover damage, make sure to mark that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Uncanny Dodge affect this at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, because you were relying on her eagle maneuverability, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well then, I shoot the wings out immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The wings emerge as both of you begin to plummet at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth? As you're plummeting, Vax, I need you to roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: J'mon, they're fine. They told us they're fine! They'll be here any second! Don't worry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did see this happen, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, roll a perception check. With disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll really high, twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reliable talent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, you're able to see a slight shift in wind to give you a brief moment to see where Keyleth's invisible, plummeting body is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm still invisible as I'm falling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you haven't cast a spell or any attacks. So you manage to see this brief shimmer in space where the wind bends around her reverting form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick it up, grab it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You thrust downward with your wings. You grab her body and manage to carry. You can feel her invisible body below you as you bring it back up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Punch me in the face. Punch me in the face right now!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here! Do a barrel roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Another giant arm swings, but swings wide as it attempts to swing in the same place it did before. It does not seem to see the two of you quickly approach the proximity of its torso. You hear this (zooming) passing over you by about 30 or 40 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, trying to go for J'mon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, trying to go where you guys were. You still have a visual point on it, so you direct and tug Vax by the hair and ears in the direction of the path you saw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: By the ponytail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, basically. And there, on the edge, you can see J'mon Sa Ord there, wings flapping, as you guys rocket down and land right on the edge of the footsteps. There's about a five-foot gap where the water isn't rushing past.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I immediately cast Control Water and suck it inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The waterfall stops and bends upward and is now being held. You guys have a row of steps ahead of you that are safe enough to land on right now. They're still slick with water, but there isn't a rushing waterfall pouring over them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see where to go to? An opening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it ascends upward out of view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what's happening. This is who we are now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: J'mon, they swoop down and the giant dragon claws (clattering) grapple onto the rock side of this large titan and leans forward, giving each of you the opportunity to jump a very short distance over to these steps. As each of you make this leap, J'mon disengages and flies up and says, "I "can only grant you so much, for I have many to watch out here as we distract he who resides "above. However, take this." As the dragon head descends, you see the eyes flare with energy as they cast Mass Cure Wounds. Ooh, two sixes and a seven, not bad. All right, 12, 19. That's going to be 28 hit points healed to both of you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That helps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, as we were landing, the gashes all over Vax's face started to heal up a little bit, but not all the way. Then suddenly they went even further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be safe, and I'll see you on the other side."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (fake-crying) See you on the other side of the war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (extended cheering)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Keep it up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a little surreal.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Thank you for waiting, thank you for coming, thank you for participating! Don't worry, it's almost Thursday. Good night, GenCon! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: See you guys tomorrow. Get some sleep. Thanks so much; this was a lot of fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you guys so much for joining us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What time is the signing? That's actually a real question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, trigger warning on that question. Oh, the signing is at 2:30, looks like, begins at 2:30. Yeah, ticket says 3:00?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Lucas Oil Field Stadium.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, don't touch that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what you've done.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: I hope you brought two gallons of hand sanitizer with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you guys. Good night.
